==============
 @public NEWS
==============

0.3 (2016-05-25)
================
* Raise ``ValueError`` when ``__all__`` isn't a list (or subclass) instance.


0.2 (2016-05-22)
================
* Documentation updates based on initial feedback.
* Some minor test suite clean up.


0.1 (2016-05-09)
================
* Initial release.
